h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Celestial Lotus Seeds Location
content: This is along the main path when you are making your way through the area, so you can't miss him. Once you free him, enter his shop screen and you will be able to choose the Celestial Lotus Seeds.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Celestial_Lotus_Seeds.md', within the main section titled 'Celestial Lotus Seeds', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Celestial Lotus Seeds Location'.
The content is as follows:
This is along the main path when you are making your way through the area, so you can't miss him. Once you free him, enter his shop screen and you will be able to choose the Celestial Lotus Seeds.
